JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Julia Laffranque;Khanlar Hajiyev;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and is currently serving his sentence in PERSON in the Murmansk Region . The respondent Government are represented by Mr PERSON , ORG at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE ORG in a jury trial convicted the applicant of a number of serious criminal offences , including CARDINAL counts of murder , attempted murder and robbery , and sentenced him to CARDINAL years’ imprisonment and a fine in the amount of MONEY ( RUB ) . During the trial the applicant , represented by a lawyer of his own choosing , protested his innocence .
On DATE he lodged an appeal before ORG of GPE ( “ ORG ” ) . He also made a special request to ensure his participation , as well as the participation of his counsel , in the appeal hearing .

On DATE ORG held an appeal hearing in which the applicant took part by videoconference . His lawyer did not appear . The public prosecutor was present and made his oral submissions . By the judgment of the same date , ORG upheld the applicant ’s conviction and sentence .

On DATE , on request by ORG , ORG of ORG , by way of supervisory review proceedings , quashed the judgment of DATE on the ground that the applicant ’s right to legal assistance had been infringed and remitted the case for a fresh examination before the appellate court .

On DATE ORG held a fresh appeal hearing . The applicant participated in the hearing by video link . At the beginning of the hearing , the court introduced the applicant to PERSON , a court - appointed counsel who was present in ORG courtroom . The applicant asked the court to provide him with an opportunity to discuss confidentially the strategy of his defence with counsel by means of video link . His request was granted . The court then proceeded with the examination of the applicant ’s appeal . It studied the case file and heard oral submissions by the applicant , his representative and the public prosecutor . PERSON , in particular , pointed to numerous procedural violations , and asked to quash the judgment of CARDINAL DATE and remit the applicant ’s case to the trial court for the fresh examination . By the judgment of the same date , ORG upheld the applicant ’s conviction and reduced his sentence to DATE imprisonment . According to the court record , the applicant had neither objections nor comments as regards the conduct of the proceedings .
